metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17095 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description:
tools/pal2rgb.c in pal2rgb in LibTIFF 4.0.9 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (TIFFSetupStrips heap-based buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedTIFF file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.9').
